title: Kumoi Cherry Trees
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Seals, and Marks
 bottom margin LRC, in pencil: [Hiroshi Yoshida]; b
description: large cherry tree in full blossom at R; smaller, bent cherry tree, also in full blossom at center; two kimono clad women gaze toward LL; moon rising at center; first woman wears purple striped kimono, clutches purse in PL hand; second woman wears dark striped coat over purple kimono
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
